alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued July 29 at 5:37PM PDT until July 29 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Central and Eastern Lake County, including portions of the Christmas Valley northeast of Summer Lake. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility and gusty winds. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
